attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PROVEN killers of Children, Police and other Public Sector Workers, Terrorists, or anyone killing whilst involved in a criminal act, should be executed by lethal injection, without appeal. 
This will free up valuable prison space and save the country a huge amount of money annually. 
In all aspects of our lives, we dispose of 'rubbish.' 
That is what these people are!
Special allowances should be given for 'affairs of the heart.'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
